revised_title: Helen Porter's Life and Contributions to Plant Biochemistry
tldr: This article is a biography of Helen Kemp Porter, a prominent plant biochemist. It covers her early life, education, and research career, focusing on her work in plant physiology and biochemistry. Porter made significant contributions to the understanding of fruit development, carbohydrate metabolism, and starch synthesis in plants.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Biochemistry
